attachments.title: Internet of Things: There’s now a US congressional committee for that
attachments.text: There could be as many as 25 billion things connected to the Internet by 2020.

text: <@U02F8LF2X>: revised answer: it bails if any interrupt is detected as evidenced by the counter(s) incrementing
sorry, read that backwards the first time.
fwiw, the main routine feels pretty hokey
if it were me, I'd just set the main loop to dump interrupt counts every second. seems more useful to determine if they've been detected
